pageProduct.name: Thompson's Omega 3 Fish Oil 400 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Omega 3 Fish Oil 400 caps helps support cardiovascular health and brain function.

Thompson's Omega-3 Fish Oil helps support cardiovascular health, brain function and general wellbeing. It is a rich source of Omega-3 fatty acids, the essential fatty acids required by the body to help support inflammatory response.

Product Claims: Thomspon's Omega-3 Fish Oil is from sustainablysourced wild fish and is regularly tested for heavy metals and pesticides.

Size: 400caps

Oil-Free?: Yes

Gender: Both

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Helps support cardiovascular health
• Helps support brain function
• Helps maintain general wellbeing
• Provides a rich source of Omega-3 fatty acids, the essential fatty acids required by the body to help support inflammatory response

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Contains Sulfites.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each capsule contains:
Fish Oil - Natural 1g (1000mg)
equiv. Eicosapentaenoic Acid (EPA) 180mg
equiv. Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) 120mg

Contains: Sulfites

Directions

Store below 25°C

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a dry place. Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
